profileDescription: I am a digital creative, developer, graphic and web designer, versatile and multidisciplinary, with 9 years of experience working for others and as a freelancer. Mainly I have been developing corporate projects of companies, as well as self-employed, and others of a personal nature.
layoutDesignerExperienceDescription: Technological consulting. Position as a layout designer in the developer holding of the BBVA bank. Main functions of layout desing of web components. Programming languages and tools: HTML5, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, Polymer, LitElement, Git.
webDeveloperExperienceDescription: Technological consulting. Position as a layout designer,  functional analist and developer in the UX departament. Main functions of prototyping and layout of web applications. Support to Angular front-end team with the latest releases. Programming languages and tools: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery, Sass, Adobe XD, Git, Angular.
webDeveloperExperienceFoodExperts: Technological consulting firm of the agri-food sector. Position as responsible of the graphic/web design area included in the department of Development. Main functions of prototyping and layout of the different modules belonging to the internal management platform. Support to the team of programmers in the ASP.Net development environment. Programming languages and tools: HTML 5, CSS 3, Bootstrap, jQuery, Sass, Axure, JIRA, Git, Visual Studio, C#, SQL.
seoConsultantExperienceDescriptio: Digital marketing agency. Position as SEO consultant in the marketing area. Main functions of web consultant in relation to Google search engines. Direct communication with the client and support to the design area for improvements in the websites of the companies. Programming languages and tools: HTML5, CSS3, PHP, WordPress, Prestashop, Joomla.
layoutDesignerExperienceHoonter: Start-up of human resources and recruiting. Position as web developer in the design area. Main functions of layout of the web page and its different modules. Programming languages and tools: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery, Trello, JustInMind.
webGraphicDesignerExperienceDescription: Real estate agency in Madrid center. Position as responsible of the graphic design and branding creator. Main functions generating graphic contents on-line and off-line. Support for the creation of the website. Programming languages and tools: Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop and Indesign.
webGraphicDesignerExperienceFreelance: Many and different type of projects for Small and Medium Companies, self-employed and also personal, using the full range of tools and technologies for their development. Graphic content using the Adobe Suite and web development with HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap or WordPress.
industrialEngineeringExperienceDescripti: Stage as industrial engineer carrying out functions of technical office, building-sites management or logistics, both in Spain and in Chile, being part of a team or managing personnel. Regular communication with customers and suppliers. Featured companies: PGI Group, Leing Ingeniería, Nestlé o Grundfos. Softwares and tools: Autocad, SAP or Presto.
